name: Groove Vortex
description:
Groove Vortex is a new infinite action game with vibrant visuals and an original electronic soundtrack. Test your reflexes as you dart through an endless geometric maze. Dodge your surroundings while the world around you collapses.

Get the original soundtrack on iTunes!
http://groovevortex.com/music/itunes

Have feedback? We are listening! Send an email to support@groovevortex.com and tell us what you'd like to see.
